articles.headline: Vulnerable Republicans See Immigration as Political Salvation
articles.snippet: From the Rocky Mountain West to Texas and to California, Republican backers of an immigration petition are making life tough on Speaker Paul D. Ryan.
articles.abstract: From the Rocky Mountain West to Texas and to California, Republican backers of an immigration petition are making life tough on Speaker Paul D. Ryan.
articles.lead_paragraph: Sign up for California Today for the latest news on the June 5 primary and more here.
